title: ScratchJr Integrated Programming Workshop for Enhancing Computational Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic logical reasoning skills and foundational mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, including assignments that encourage parental participation at home.

learning_goals: Students implement three or more projects applying sequential, event-driven, and parallelism concepts using ScratchJr
Learners enhance logical error correction skills by over 80% through debugging and code reuse
Maintenance of over 70% computational thinking indicators in a formative assessment one month post-training
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
